projectDescription: A custom symposium platform for MURALS that replaces ForagerOne. Students register and submit abstracts, posters, and oral presentations as groups. Judges are assigned submissions and evaluate anonymously. All content lives in a searchable public gallery that serves as a permanent archive.
internalNotes: Replacing ForagerOne/Symposium. Scope based on conversation from 1.5 years ago—may need refinement during discovery. Key features: group-based submissions, anonymous judging, public gallery, abstract booklet export. Future: audience registration tracking.

phases.name: Discovery & Planning
phases.description: Document requirements, define user roles (students, judges, admins), plan data models, and confirm full scope. Note: original conversation was 1.5 years ago—discovery may uncover additional requirements.

phases.name: Core Platform
phases.description: Registration system with group names and CSU ID verification. Submission forms for abstracts, posters (PDF/image), and oral presentations (PPT embed, video embed). Admin dashboard for deadline control and content management.

phases.name: Judging System
phases.description: Anonymous judging workflow where judges see only assigned submissions. Custom evaluation forms with scoring criteria. Score aggregation and winner selection tools. Judge assignment and management for admins.

phases.name: Public Gallery & Archive
phases.description: Searchable public gallery displaying posters, abstracts, and presentations organized by category. Permanent archive for past participants. Abstract booklet generation (organized by category, then alphabetically).

phases.name: Testing & Launch
phases.description: Quality assurance, user acceptance testing with sample submissions, bug fixes, deployment, admin training, and documentation.

benefits.title: Group Submissions
benefits.description: Any team member can submit on behalf of their group using a shared group name.

benefits.title: Anonymous Judging
benefits.description: Judges evaluate submissions without seeing student names, ensuring fair assessment.

benefits.title: Multi-Format Support
benefits.description: Accept posters, PDFs, PowerPoint presentations, and embedded videos in one place.

benefits.title: Scoring & Results
benefits.description: Custom evaluation criteria with automatic score aggregation and winner selection.

benefits.title: Public Gallery
benefits.description: Showcase all submissions in a searchable, browsable gallery open to the community.

benefits.title: Permanent Archive
benefits.description: Past submissions remain accessible forever so participants can reference their work.

benefits.title: Abstract Booklet
benefits.description: Generate a formatted PDF booklet organized by category and alphabetically by title.

benefits.title: Deadline Control
benefits.description: Admins can open, close, and extend submission windows without developer help.

benefits.title: CSU Branding
benefits.description: Fully branded experience matching CSU and OIE visual identity.
